actions.description: Matched regulator-ready, executive tone while maintaining empathy by acknowledging client autonomy and audit needs.
actions.evidence: Greeting and Collaboration sections mirror client language such as 'regulator-ready', 'Sigstore attestations', and 'evidence manifest'.

actions.description: Explicitly referenced hardware lead times, TLS 1.2 constraints, and MAS TRM change windows to show awareness of client risks.
actions.evidence: Collaboration Model section maintains a living risk register with mitigation owners.

actions.description: Demonstrated partnership mindset by highlighting autonomous handoff, shared evidence workspace, and tailored time-zone overlap.
actions.evidence: Greeting and Next Steps sections emphasize empowering internal teams and flexible scheduling.
